resources.string: Displays detailed information (i.e. artist, album, genre, etc.) about a particular song. A user can return to the play screen for the targeted song (PlayActivity), or return to their song library (MainActivity). The store can also be accessed, where more songs can be purchased (StoreActivity).

Allows for the purchase of songs using the Android Pay API. The implementation of this involves several steps: checking if the user is ready to pay, requesting a Payment Token, creating a Masked Wallet request, adding a purchase button with WalletFragment, requesting the Full Wallet, and retrieving the Full Wallet. A user can also return to the store to view songs available for purchase (Store activity), or return to their library of songs (MainActivity).
Plays a particular song. A user can select details to navigate to a details page for the targeted song (DetailsActivity), or return to their song library (MainActivity).

Displays a collection of songs available for purchase by the user, which they do not currently own. A particular song has a button for purchasing (PaymentActivity) and more information (DetailsActivity).

Displays a collection of songs belonging to the user that can be selected, which then plays the chosen song (PlayActivity). The store can also be accessed where more songs can be purchased (StoreActivity).
